If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

entry.summary: ...SHORT TERM RISES ALONG THE MISSOURI RIVER NEAR WILLISTON... Recent and forecast heavy rainfall are expected to cause water rises along the Missouri River near Williston.
